name: Cube (itch) (kmerrill1)
description:
Created for the UCF 2020 Summer Staycation Game Jam:  https://itch.io/jam/gdk-summer-game-jam-2020

Current levels: 

Green (grass level)

Blue (water level + action packed Cone clone boss battle)

================================================

It's coming...

A game unlike anything you've ever seen before...

Prepare yourself

FOR CUBE!

You are now CUBE, defender of the polyverse!

but be warned, for there are many obstructions that cube will face

you will have to guide cube around the things that cube cannot go through!

Collect the diamonds and reach the goal!

Each goal leads to a new colored level: Blue, Orange, Yellow, Purple

And if you are brave enough, and enough of a game master

you can make it to LEVEL RED

where you will face

the dreaded CONE

(This is much better than that fake cube game created by the followers of Cone)

Inspired by the Cube video
